message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product. I'm open to offers, but I'm looking for at least $100 for it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $85 is a little low for me. How about we split the difference at $92.50?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $82.50.
Bob, I'm willing to come down a bit more. I'm  offering the product for $87.50. This is a fair price, considering the value of the product.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $83.50.
Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $85. This is a fair price for both of us. What do you say?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $79.50.
